name: Material design multi step form for sms sending / checkout
description:
Material design multi-step form with Auto Layout, Variants, Components and templates.

I used an atomic design to better config options and UI. So file contains 4 pages such as atoms, molecules, organisms and pages.


You can use this file for modern and easy step by step checkout process by changing names and content of the steps. Easy to add and customize steps because steps are pre-made components in this project.
